file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-46-00-05 - LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the test of the Logotype Lights. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL ALL 33-46-00-700-801-A TEST EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-46-00 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-46-00-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST A. General This task gives the procedures to do the Operational Test of the Logotype Lights. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 33-46-00/1 ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Energize the aircraft with the External DC Power Supply ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). (2) Make sure that the Circuit Breaker below is closed: – LOGO LIGHT (AMM SDS 33-46-00/1). J. Operationally Test Logotype Lights (Figure 501) SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) Do the test of the Logotype Lights as follows: (a) Set the LOGO light switch, on the overhead panel, to the ON position. Result: 1 The left logotype light, on the left stabilizer spar II, comes on. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 33-46-00 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL 2 The right logotype light, on the right stabilizer spar II, comes on. (b) Set the LOGO light switch to the OFF position. Result: 1 The left logotype light goes off. 2 The right logotype light goes off. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Deenergize the aircraft ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 33-46-00 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
